desc: Using problem solving techniques, students study topics from non-continuous mathematics, including basic counting principles, mathematical induction, recursion, efficiency of algorithms, and graph heory. Prerequisite: Mathematics 120 or Computer Science 121 or 125. Offered in 2012-13 and alternate years.
name: Discrete Mathematics
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Mathematics 120 or Computer Science 121 or 125. Offered in 2012-13 and alternate years.
